alert.note: Alert for Little River (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 7:18AM CDT until June 18 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LITTLE RIVER...BOWIE...NORTHERN MORRIS... NORTHEASTERN TITUS AND SOUTHEASTERN RED RIVER COUNTIES... At 718 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ashdown to Hooks to 8 miles south of De Kalb to Dalby Springs to near Wilkerson, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ashdown, New Boston, Foreman, Hooks, De Kalb, Us 259 And I 30 Intersection, Dalby Springs, Richmond, Leary, Almont, Spring Hill, Lydia, Wallace, Arden and Red Bank. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
